results.name: Triangle of coefficients of polynomials in Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n,k)*k^r.
comment: For a table of coefficients of these polynomials without factors removed see A209849. - Peter Bala, Mar 16 2012
reference: E. Kilic, Y. T. Ulutas and N. Omur, Formulas for weighted binomial sums using the powers of terms of binary recurrences, Miskolc Mathematical Notes, Vol. 13 (2012), No. 1, pp. 53-65. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 16 2012
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Binomial Sums
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jan 15 2005
